title: Linda Dillon – 2022 Comments on Murder of Sean Brown
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Linda Dillon, the Mid Ulster MLA for Sinn Fein, on 13 May 2022.
content:
Today, the PSNI has made an undisclosed settlement to the family of Bellaghy Wolfe Tones GAA chairman Sean Brown for failures in the original police investigation.
